sen.j: 薩長（さっちょう）は、薩摩藩と長州藩の略称である。
sen.e: Satcho is an abbreviation of the Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain.
Satcho is an abbreviation of the Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain.
Satcho is an abbreviation of the Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain.

sen.j: 薩長は禁門の変などで激しく対立していたが、坂本竜馬の仲介で薩長同盟が結ばれた。
sen.e: The Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain had been in conflict with each other, but an intermediation by Ryoma SAKAMOTO led to the Satsuma-Choshu Alliance.
The Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain had been in conflict with each other, but an intermediation by Ryoma SAKAMOTO led to the Satsuma-Choshu Alliance.
The Satsuma Domain and the Choshu Domain had been in conflict with each other, but an intermediation by Ryoma SAKAMOTO led to the Satsuma-Choshu Alliance.

sen.j: 明治新政府の要職や陸海軍の幹部には薩長出身者が多く占めていた。
sen.e: A majority of the officers in important posts in the new Meiji Government and the armed forces came from Satcho.
A majority of the officers in important posts in the new Meiji Government and the armed forces came from Satcho.
A majority of the officers in important posts in the new Meiji Government and the armed forces came from Satcho.
